author: robwaugh1974
title: Facebook activates Safety Check after Westminster Bridge attack leaves several injured
text:
Facebook has activated its ‘Safety Check’ tool for the Westminster Bridge attack – allowing friends to see if people are affected.
Terror in London: Police officer stabbed and people mowed down by car outside Parliament The tool allows Facebook users in the area to tell friends they are safe automatically, and users are offered a list of friends who might be in the area.
The tool has previously been used during events such as the Orlando shootings and Paris attacks.
You can see a list of your friends (and tell others you are safe) here .
The tool was activated after a policeman was stabbed and his apparent attacker shot by officers in a major security incident at the Houses of Parliament.
Around three shots rang out outside the Palace of Westminster after a man ran through the gates into the front yard of the parliamentary compound apparently waving a knife.
PA  
Scotland Yard says the attack is being treated ‘as a terrorist incident until we know otherwise’.
Two people were seen being treated on the ground in New Palace Yard amid shouts and screams.
An air ambulance landed in Parliament Square and a regular ambulance came in through the front gates as medics rushed to help the injured people.
